about_the_game:
This game offers:
  • Bots to play agianst
  • Over 80 upgrades to change your tank in unique ways.
  • 7 different game modes all with unique features.
  • Private and public lobbies up to 250 players. Note: You will need above average internet to host more than 20 players
  • Support for rejoining, if you ever lose connection don't worry you can rejoin at any point.
  • Text chat and message system for discussing things with people you're playing with.
  • Chat commands for lobby moderation and administration.
  • A cosmetic system that allows you to change your color and put on a hat of your choice.
  • Custom game settings for each gamemode set by the host.
  • The ability to join teams, or play free for all, or a mix of either.
  • An easy-to-use map editor with copy paste flip rotate tools.

Gamemodes!

  • Battle Royale - A shrinking ring of death closes in forcing players to kill each other, the last player or team alive wins.
  • King Of The Hill - Players fight over a capture point to score points.
  • Capture The Flag - A team gamemode where you work with your team to keep your flag safe and capture the enemy flag.
  • Deathmatch - A gamemode where you kill everyone in your sight, whoever gets the most kills win.
  • Juggernaut - A player is chosen at random to get buffed and everyone else must work together to kill them.
  • Castle Siege - A team gamemode that you attack or defend a king, the game ends when the timer runs out.
  • Bottle of collectors - A four way team gamemode where each team tries to collect and steal bottles from other teams while also keeping their bottles safe.

Modifier Shop!

A majority of the gamemodes have a modifier shop where you can buy tank modifications to make your tank into a personalized killing machine. Some gamemodes have pre-made classes to keep the gamemodes fast-paced. Most of the modifiers act passively but some of them can be activated for special effects!

Bots!

Tank Fight offers slightly above average skilled bots that can be added to Battle Royale, King Of The Hill, Deathmatch, and Juggernaut. The bots only come in one difficulty, however if you find them to easy you can just add more, but if they are too hard you might find the /addMoney command is very useful in gaining a competitive edge. The bots can be managed through chat commands, they can also play on any reasonable custom map!

Level Editor!

Tank Fight has an easy to use level editor that can be used to make maps for any gamemode. There are powerful tools to aid in map creation. After making a map you can host a lobby and use your map without the other players needing to download it, you can also upload maps to the steam workshop for other people to have a copy of your amazing creation!

  • Bots to play agianst
  • Over 80 upgrades to change your tank in unique ways.
  • 7 different game modes all with unique features.

name: Tank Fight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11 x64bit
  • Processor: AMD FX(tm)-6300 Six-Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11 x64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Tank Fight is a PvP game where you upgrade your tank and compete with others until someone wins.
